Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product available in the Tlemcen Smart Supermarket.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the product name.

price.description: Product price. For a 'bundle' type, this is the total price of the bundle.

purchasePrice.description: The cost price of the product for the supermarket. Admin only.

stock.description: Current stock quantity of the product.

images.description: Array of image URLs for the product.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the product.

averageRating.description: The average rating of the product, from 0 to 5.

reviewCount.description: The total number of reviews for the product.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the product was created.

type.description: The type of the product. 'standard' for a single item, 'bundle' for a collection of items.

bundleItems.description: An array of product document IDs. Only applicable if type is 'bundle'.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of products. The document ID is the category's unique identifier.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the category name.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Tlemcen Smart Supermarket.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (from Firebase Auth).

avatar.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

orderCount.description: Total number of orders placed by the user.

totalSpent.description: Total amount of money spent by the user.

loyaltyPoints.description: Total loyalty points accumulated by the user.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a user.

orderDate.description: Date and time when the order was placed.

status.description: Status of the order (e.g., Pending, Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled).

shippingAddress.description: The user's shipping address for this order.

items.description: Array of order items, denormalized for efficiency.

productName.description: Denormalized product name for display purposes.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the order item.

price.description: Price of the product at the time of the order.

phone.description: Contact phone number for the business.

deliveryFeeBase.description: The base delivery fee for orders below the threshold.

deliveryFeeThreshold.description: The order total threshold to qualify for the high-tier delivery fee.

deliveryFeeHigh.description: The delivery fee for orders that meet or exceed the threshold.

expiryDate.description: The date and time when the coupon expires.

isActive.description: Whether the coupon is currently active.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a user review for a product or recipe.

userId.description: ID of the user who wrote the review.

userName.description: Name of the user who wrote the review (denormalized).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the review was created.

WishlistItem.title: Wishlist Item
WishlistItem.description: Represents a single item in a user's wishlist.

productId.description: Reference to the Product. The document ID is the product ID.

addedAt.description: Timestamp when the item was added to the wishlist.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the recipe title.

averageRating.description: The average rating of the recipe, from 0 to 5.

reviewCount.description: The total number of reviews for the recipe.

name.description: The name of the shopping list.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this list.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the list was created.

items.description: Raw text items added by the user.

ContactMessage.title: Contact Message
ContactMessage.description: Represents a message sent through the contact form.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user this notification is for.

link.description: A URL to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the notification was created.

TeamMember.title: Team Member
TeamMember.description: Represents a team member displayed on the about page.

name.description: The full name of the team member.

role.description: The role or position of the team member.

avatar.description: URL for the team member's avatar image.

PageContent.title: Page Content
PageContent.description: Represents the editable content for a static page, in multiple languages.

content_fr.description: The main page content in French (Markdown format).

content_ar.description: The main page content in Arabic (Markdown format).

SiteImage.title: Site Image
SiteImage.description: Represents a manageable image used throughout the site.

id.description: A unique slug-like identifier for the image (e.g., 'about-page-hero'). The document ID will be this slug.

description.description: A description of the image for alt text.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a similar image (e.g., 'supermarket interior').

/products/{productId}.description: Stores product information. Contains a private `purchasePrice` field for admins.

/products/{productId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Stores reviews for a specific product. Writable by the user who owns the review.

/categories/{categoryId}.description: Stores category information. Readable by all users, writable only by admins.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Accessible only by the user and admins.

/users/{userId}/addresses/{addressId}.description: Stores user addresses. Only accessible by the user and admins.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores user orders. Only accessible by the user who created the order and admins. Includes denormalized `userId` for authorization.

/users/{userId}/wishlist/{productId}.description: Stores a user's wishlist items. The document ID is the product ID for quick lookups. Only accessible by the user who owns the wishlist and admins.

/users/{userId}/shopping-lists/{listId}.description: Stores a user's shopping lists. Only accessible by the user who owns the list.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user. Only accessible by that user.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Collection to store admin user IDs. Presence of a document with role 'admin' indicates admin privileges.

/settings/site.description: Stores global site settings in a single document.

/coupons/{couponId}.description: Stores discount coupons. Readable by all users, writable only by admins.

/recipes/{recipeId}.description: Stores cooking recipes. Publicly readable, writable only by admins.

/recipes/{recipeId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Stores reviews for a specific recipe. Writable by the user who owns the review.

/contactMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages submitted through the contact form. Writable by anyone, but not readable by clients.

/teamMembers/{memberId}.description: Stores information about team members. Publicly readable, admin writable.

/pageContent/{pageId}.description: Stores editable content for static pages. Publicly readable, admin writable. Page ID can be 'about', 'privacy', 'terms'.

/siteImages/{imageId}.description: Stores manageable images for use across the site. Publicly readable, admin writable.
